food – used especially when talking about the business of producing or selling food
a substance regularly used as food, especially one that is produced and sold as a product
a sharp rise in the price of foodstuffs
Most of the imports consist of essential foodstuffs (=extremely important food, such as grain, bread or rice).
shortages ofbasic foodstuffs and consumer goods
one of Japan’s staple foodstuffs, the soya bean
